content: I've been enjoying The New Yorker magazine for about 6 months now, and I've been really impressed by their in-depth articles on politics and culture. I try to finish at least 2-3 articles per issue. Speaking of journalism, I've been thinking about my own media consumption habits lately. Can you recommend some good podcasts on journalism and media? I've been listening to "The Daily" from The New York Times, but I'd love to explore more options.
